salathaya sthapanaya kirima ha sathwayin kapa kirima: uththarithara allah pamapase sandahan karayi: "niyatha washapayanma mape salathaya(namaduma) mape puda pujawan mape jiwithaya ha mape maranaya rebul aalamin (wishwayadhipathi) wu allahtama yayi (nabi muhammad) " (alkuraan:6:162) thawada allah pamapase pawasayi: "ebawin obape rakshithayata salathaya itu kara (pilima pawanupawan sathun bilidipam paramparika charyapawan midi allahpe thrupthiya balapapoparoththupawan pamanak ohu pawanupawan sathwayan) bilipadanna."
aluth giwisume kithunuwan samaga dewiyan wahanse katayuthu karanne melesamayi.

yudawaru thamunge drohikama nisa babiloniyata genayanaladdoya. 2 thamunge urumawalada nuwarawalada wasayakala palamuweni wasiyo nam: ishrayelwaruth pujakayoth lewiwaruth nethinimwaruthya.9:2 dewamaliga sulu sewakayan. 3 yuda puthrayangenuth benyamin puthrayangenuth eprayim saha manasse puthrayangenuth yerusalamehi wasayakala aya nam: 4 yudage puthraya wana pereshge puthrayangen banige puthrawu imrige puthraya wana omrige puthrawu ammihudge puthraya wana uuthayiya. 5 shiloniwarungen kulundulawu asaya saha ohuge puthrayoya. 6 serage puthrayangen yewuyel saha owunge sahodarayo hasiya anudenekya. 7 benyamin puthrayangen hassenuwage puthraya wana hodawiyage puthrawu meshullamge puthraya wana salluda; 8 yerohamge puthrawu ibneyada mikrige puthraya wana ussige puthrawu eelada ibniyage puthraya wana rewuyelge puthrawu shepatiyage puthraya wana meshullamda; 9 owunge paramparawala hatiyata owunge sahodarayan nawasiya panashadenekda yana ayaya.
